TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewRowHeaderCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell

summary.span: 表示 控件中的行标头。

span.span: Represents a row header of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 app.config 文件包含以下条目时，将根据系统 DPI 设置调整行状态图像 (铅笔、星号和箭头) ：The row status images (pencil, asterisk, and arrow) are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ```

para.span: 当从 派生类派生并向其添加新属性时，请确保重写 方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 还应调用基类的 方法，以便将基类的属性复制到新单元。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不显式调用 方法，则在引用 属性时将会调用此方法。If you do not explicitly call the method, it will be called when the property is referenced. > [!NOTE] > 若要获取或设置 ，你必须添加对 `Accessibility` 随 .NET Framework 一起安装的程序集的引用。To get or set , you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据控件的属性的值 ，此方法由控件的方法调用， 用于检索表示单元格的剪贴板格式值。Depending on the value of the property of the control, this method is called by the control's method to retrieve a clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell. 此方法的位置相关参数指示此单元格位于数据表中的位置，该数据表示控件中的选定单元格定义的区域 。The position-related parameters of this method indicate where this cell is located in the table of data representing the region defined by the selected cells in the control. 除了单元格值外，此方法还可能会返回格式设置信息，具体取决于单元格的位置。Depending on the cell's position, formatting information may be returned by this method in addition to the cell value. 例如，行第一列中的单元格的 HTML 格式将包括指示行的开头的标记。For example, the HTML format for a cell in the first column of a row will include the tag that indicates the beginning of a row. 支持的剪贴板格式包括 、 、 和 。The supported clipboard formats include , , , and . 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class.

exception.span: 小于零，或者大于或等于控件中的行数。

span.span: is less than zero or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the control.
